name: AdGuard Home
short_description: DNS-level ad blocking and privacy protection with parental controls.
description: AdGuard Home is a network-wide DNS server that blocks ads and trackers at the DNS level, protecting every device on your network without per-device configuration. It supports custom DNS rules, parental controls, safe search enforcement, query logs, and statistics dashboards.
usecases: Block ads and tracking domains across all devices on your home network using a single DNS server.
Apply parental controls and safe search enforcement network-wide without installing software on each device.
